titleStmt.title: The schoole of beastes; intituled, the good housholder, or the oeconomickes. Made dialogue-wise, by M. Peter Viret, translated out of French into English, by I.R.
Metamorphose Chrestienne. Part 2. English
titleStmt.author: Viret, Pierre, 1511-1571.
I. B., fl. 1585.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by I.B., of Part 2 of: Viret, Pierre. Metamorphose chrestienne.
